subject: Photography
title: Bird's Eye and Worm's Eye Views
description: Learn Bird's Eye and Worm's Eye Views in one minute.

hook.text: Look straight down. Now look straight up. Those two angles show worlds most people never photograph.

buildup.text: Bird's eye view looks directly down, flattening the world into patterns and shapes unseen at ground level.

discovery.text: Worm's eye view looks straight up, turning ceilings, trees, and skyscrapers into dramatic converging towers.

twist.text: Drones made bird's eye accessible to everyone. But worm's eye only requires lying on the ground â€” and courage.

climax.text: Extreme angles abstract familiar scenes. A sidewalk from above becomes geometry. A forest floor looking up becomes art.

punchline.text: The world looks different from the ground and the sky.

quiz.question: What effect does a bird's eye view create?
options: It flattens scenes into patterns and abstract shapes
